## makeMap() function

Clone a map or map-like object into a new map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function makeMap<TVal>(val: Optional<MapLike<TVal>>): Map<string, TVal>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  val | <code>Optional&lt;MapLike&lt;TVal&gt;&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
